mean_cn: v.忽视，未注意到；眺望，俯视
mean_en: "to fail to see or notice something; to see something wrong or bad but decide to ignore it; to not consider somebody for a job or position
sentence: He\u0027s so busy on his computer that he\u0027s totally overlooked his son.
sentence_trans: 他忙着看电脑，全然忽视了他的儿子。
word_etyma: over在上，在外 + look看 → 在上面看 → 俯视；疏忽
